Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO BUDGET AND REVENUE

Title: Imposes an excise tax on sugary drinks
Summary: Imposes an excise tax on sugary drinks; establishes a community health equity fund to utilize the revenues generated by such tax.
LawCode: Add Art 17 §§400 - 408, Tax L; add §99-rr, St Fin L; add Art 2 Title 3-A §§244 - 244-b, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law and the state finance law, in relation to imposing an excise tax on sugary drinks; and to amend the public health law, in relation to community health benefits
